sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The WHO says Christmas gatherings need to be cancelled in order to save lives from rising coronavirus cases.

sentences.sentence: Omicron takes over from Delta as the most prevalent strain of COVID-19 in the US.

sentences.sentence: Poland and Lithuania show support for Ukraine amid a Russian troop build-up near the Ukrainian border.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Millions across Europe are hoping for a festive time this weekend with family and friends.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But for the second year running running this could be in doubt. The World Health Organization is recommending cancelling events over the holiday period in the light of growing cases of the Omicron variant of coronavirus worldwide. It's a message few want to hear. All of us are sick of this pandemic. All of us want to spend time with friends and family.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But an event cancelled is better than a life cancelled.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: It's better to cancel now and celebrate later than to celebrate now and grieve later.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: None of us want to be here again in 12 months' time.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: But for most governments, the focus is on booster campaigns or considering possible lockdowns.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The Netherlands is already in one of those.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Switzerland has announced tight new Covid measures from December 20th, including making working from home mandatory for all those who can.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: To be honest, I find it a bit difficult with the topic of vaccination.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Now you're vaccinated and have the feeling that it's good, but somehow you notice that it still doesn't help that much.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In Germany, federal and state governments are considering contact restrictions after Christmas, even for the vaccinated and recovering individuals.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: For example, you can reduce the size of groups. In Bavaria, they have already closed bars and clubs for the upcoming days and weeks to avoid hotspots and super-spreading events.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Germany's new chancellor Olaf Scholzultz, says the country will reach its target of offering booster shots to at least 30 million citizens by the end of the year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Omicron is now the dominant COVID-19 variant in the U.S.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: And it has people concerned ahead of the holidays.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: And it has people concerned ahead of the holidays. Most states have cases confirmed, with Florida and Washington the current hot spots.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: I think, like, I'm glad to see that people are getting tests.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: If they're going to travel, I assume that's part of the reason why they're doing it with the upcoming holidays.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: But it's also probably because a lot of people are starting to not feel very well with the new Omicron variant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: So I'm a little it's disappointing and heart.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It's like it's mixed emotions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Poland and Lithuania has joined Ukraine in a call for stronger Western sanctions against Moscow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: This comes amid a Russian troop built up near the Ukrainian border, fueling fears of an invasion possibly as early as next year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The leaders met with President Volodymyr Zelensky in a show of support in the face of what they describe as ongoing aggression against Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Together, the premiers signed a joint treaty aimed at prioritizing their common security and economic interests.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Zelensky said, our shared task is to contain the threat, to protect Europe from aggressive Russian policy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Today, Ukraine, Poland and Lithuania are at the forefront of this containment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: U.S. intelligence officials say Russia has amassed 70,000 troops near its border with Ukraine, while US President Joe Biden has already warned that Russia would face severe consequences if Moscow attacked its neighbour.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The Kremlin continues to deny any plan of attack, but says it will respond in kind if NATO deploys missiles capable of reaching Russia in a few minutes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Kosovo has reached a deal to let 300 of its jail cells to Denmark at an annual fee of 15 million euro to ease overcrowding in the Scandinavian country's prisons.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The inmates sent to Kosovo will be foreign nationals, subject to deportation after serving their sentences.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Recently the prison population in Denmark has jumped nearly 20%.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The jury has begun its deliberations in Ghislaine Maxwell's sex trafficking trial in New York.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The prosecution earlier closed its arguments calling the girlfriend of convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein a sophisticated predator.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The defence insists Maxwell is being made a scapegoat for the crimes of the late Epstein, who killed himself in prison.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The verdict is expected before Christmas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Complete carnage.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: That's how the Red Cross described the devastating scenes in the Philippines after Super Typhoon Rai ravaged the country's southern and central regions, killing at least 375 people and injuring hundreds more. Hitting the islands with speeds up to 195 km per hour, the storm toppled concrete poles, uprooted trees and wiped out entire villages. Some victims have expressed their frustration at the government's lack of response to the disaster.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: We paid big taxes when we were working, but now they can't help us.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: However, President Rodrigo Duterte promised to release over 35 million euros to assist the nation's recovery on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Thousands of military, post guards and fire personnel have been deployed to the worst affected areas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Orbiting high above Earth, Japanese billionaire Yusaku Maezawa, his producer and a Russian cosmonaut bid farewell to the crew of the International Space Station after spending 12 days there.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The trip marks the first self-paid tourist visit to the spacecraft since 2009 and has mooted to a cost of staggering 80 million dollars.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Mr Maezawa said that once you're in space you realize how much it's worth by having this amazing experience.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: He also deflected criticism that the money could have been spent on worthier causes back on Earth, saying that those who criticise his trip have never been to space.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The capsule made a soft landing in the steppes of Kazakhstan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Mr. Maisawa, who made his fortune in the fashion industry, has also booked a flyby around the moon with Elon Musk's Starship.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: That trip is likely to happen in 2023.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Rafael Nadal has tested positive for COVID-19 after playing in the Madbadala tournament in Abu Dhabi, bringing into doubt his participation in the Australian Open in January.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: With this tweet, he has announced that he has COVID-19.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It reads, I wanted to announce that on my return home from the Abu Dhabi tournament, I've tested positive for COVID via a PCR test that was carried out on my arrival in Spain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: After months out from a foot injury, Rafa Nadal lost to Britain's Andy Murray in Abu Dhabi.
